description: This CSS file defines styles for a web application, including theme management with light and dark modes using CSS variables, various class styles, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application style with background color, text color, and layout settings.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo with animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Style for the header section of the application.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button.
